title: Partnership
formText: Join the businesses making use of one of the worlds leading proactive employee support tools.

blocks.bannerText:
Insurance Broker, Medical EAP Specialist or Healthcare Provider? 
We want to hear from you.

blocks.text: Organisations across the globe trust Wellmi to support and enhance the physical and mental wellbeing of their staff.

blocks.text1: NCS Ltd – A leading UK based retail distribution company.
blocks.text2: Cirencester College – One of the first educational institutions in the UK to proactively support student wellbeing with our service.
blocks.text3: Heart Heroes – An incredible charity supporting the lives of families and children living with serious heart conditions.
blocks.text4: The Opportunity Hub – An industry leader in specialised recruitment.

blocks.text:
We are always keen to speak to brokers, EAP specialists and medical businesses that are looking to connect their clients with the future of employee wellbeing support.

Simply fill out some details and a member of our team will contact you as soon as possible to answer all your questions.

Wellmi provides a unique opportunity for brokers, EAP specialists and medical businesses alike you to offer more than just a library of wellness-related benefits options, but an entire cloud solution focused on employees’ total well-being.
